example.name: Classic
example.text: So on Devils Night, we egged his house, with like 5 dozen eggs.

roleset.name: urge, coax (phrasal)
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT. Member of urge-58.1.

example.name: all args
example.text: Personally feel sorry for the police ; everyone is the country -LRB- apart from the do - gooders -RRB- is egging them on to use their bloody baton instead of shoving them , but as the news stalk the police , they ca n't do much because then sky news or bbc play constant replays of the incidents - ' Did the officers use extreme force here ' ' that man was knocked off his bike ' ' how do we know he planned to use the concrete brick
example.arg: everyone in the country -LRB- apart from the do - gooders -RRB-
to use their bloody baton instead of shoving them
